## These three are found at https://api-console.zoho.eu/ once generating a Self client application.
# The Client ID and Client Secret are found in the "Client Secret" section.
# The OAuth Token is generated by 'Generate Code', Scope being ZohoCRM.modules.ALL, Time Duration 10 minutes.

ZOHO_CLIENT_ID=
ZOHO_CLIENT_SECRET=
ZOHO_OAUTH_TOKEN=

## These two only change if you change the region.
# The default is the EU region.

ZOHO_ACCOUNTS_URL=https://accounts.zoho.eu
ZOHO_API_BASE_URL=https://www.zohoapis.eu/crm/v2

## This one isn't specifically needed, but can be useful.
ZOHO_REFRESH_TOKEN=

## This is the organization ID, which can be found at https://desk.zoho.eu/agent/YOURACCOUNTNAME/YOURACCOUNTNAME/setup#setup/developer-space/api/apiauthentication.
ORG_ID=

## You choose whichever you like, as long as you remember it.
CRM_USERNAME=
CRM_PASSWORD=
